keyword: how many calories are in a tamale
title: How Many Calories Are in a Tamale?
meta_description: Discover how many calories are in a tamale, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, carbs, fat, and tips for variations.
h1: How Many Calories Are in a Tamale?
assumptions: Traditional pork-filled corn masa tamale, steamed; average size ~150 g, including corn husk wrapper (not eaten).
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by filling (pork, chicken, veggie), masa recipe, size, and preparation; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A typical pork tamale contains about 250 kcal and 10 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a tamale?
faqs.a: About 250 kcal for a standard pork tamale.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a tamale?
faqs.a: â‰ˆ25 g carbs, 10 g protein, 12 g fat per tamale.

faqs.q: Do tamales have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 500 mg per tamale due to seasonings.
Typically 20-30 kcal less than meat-filled, with similar carbs.
Moderate at ~2 g per tamale from corn masa and fillings.
